question: 10) PHYSICAL SCIENCE Multiple Choice Which of the following has the GREATEST kinetic energy for an object moving in a straight path: W) a mass of 2 kg with a velocity of 10 meters per second X) a mass of 4 kg with a velocity of 8 meters per second Y) a mass of 6 kg with a velocity of 6 meters per second Z) a mass of 8 kg with a velocity of 4 meters per second
answer:
X) A MASS OF 4 KG WITH A VELOCITY OF 8 METERS PER SECOND
(Solution: KE = ½ mass × velocity2)
